text: Dilee dum cit ka Rasul jibantah i Rasul ngon nabi nyang Kamoe kirem A Meuhat jipeukhem jikheun beurakah s Watee geubaca dum ayat Kamoe O Chetan troh keunoe jipeuget hilah Jipeuchok ureueng keu bacaan nyan Teuma di Tuhan Neusampoh bagah Chok nyang chetan boh dalam ate jih Neusampoh bak jih teuma le Allah Neupeukong ayat-Neuh teuma lheueh nyan â€˜Eleumee Tuhan leupah that luah Lagi pih Tuhan that bijaksana
